items.name: Flame Ring Attack
items.description: Immediately damages enemies close to you.

items.name: Along Lane Attack
items.description: Shoot a flame towards the enemy base, burning all in its path

items.name: Cross Lane Attack
items.description: Attack an area on the other lane of the map.Test

items.name: Defense Buff
items.description: Increase your defense and those around you to take less damage.

items.name: Speed Buff
items.description: Increase your speed to you can move faster.

items.name: Attack Buff
items.description: Increase your attack and those around you to deal more damage.

items.name: Healing Ring Spell
items.description: Immediately heal yourself and teammates close to you.

items.name: Hero healer
items.description: Heal the player next to you.

items.name: Disguise
items.description: Turn into an enemy grunt to go unnoticed.

items.name: Super Slowdown Spell
items.description: Slow down all players and grunts around you for a short time.

items.name: Drop Bomb Attack
items.description: Drop a bomb that explodes on a delay. Does extra damage to the base.

items.name: Beserker
items.description: Deal extra damage, before self destructing!
